item.title: Nine new Covid-19 cases as lockdown decision looms
item.description:
There are nine more cases of Covid-19 in New Zealand - the second day in a row where new infections have been in single figures.
The new cases come as Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern and her Cabinet decide ...
